If you have a problem with this then you would be hypocritical to *not* have a problem with altcoins with premines like Ethereum or Ripple or the 100s of other alts.

Ethereum has become integral to the entire ecosystem.  -Tether -Wrapped Bitcoin (wbtc/tbtc) -Tokens -DeFi  -Fund-Raising -More  Personally, I'm most awaiting the long-held promise of IoT, but already Ethereum has surpassed features beyond anything I'd imagined back in early 2016.

Ethereum has been a steadfast cryptocurrency platform enabling innovative ideas, but what if it was also used to to create AI generated Scooby-Doo fan-fiction using machine learning algorithms and proof-of-scoob. In this essay I will
